attacks.name: Triggered Poison
attacks.effect: If your opponent attaches an Energy card to the Defending Pokémon during his or her next turn, that Pokémon becomes Poisoned.

attacks.name: Cross Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If you get 2 or more heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
